name: Sonic Ring Rush (Early Build)
description:
Sonic Ring Rush!

----------------------------
This was my first ever game on my first Scratch account, but it was broken and unfinished, so I decided to remake it! (OG game is titled "Sonic's Ring Rush" by abigsonicfan) I am so exited to share the finished project with you guys! If you have any reccomendations, feel free to type it in the comments. Make sure to like and favorite as well, so I KNOW that you guys want the finished product.

----------------------------
Characters and backgrounds are owned by SEGA.
----------------------------
View DEMO On Scratch: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/777125382/
